alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 5:01AM CDT until July 09 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montague County in north central Texas... Cooke County in north central Texas... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 501 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ringling to near Ryan, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Bowie, Nocona, Muenster, St. Jo, Lindsay, Callisburg, Lake Nocona, Hubert H Moss Lake, Lake Kiowa, Sunset, Lake Amon G Carter, Lake Muenster, Valley View, Nocona Hills, Montague, Walnut Bend, Prairie Point, Rosston and Bulcher. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 489 and 503. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
